titleStmt.title: The [H]istory of the [l]ife and death [of] that antient father of the church, [D]r. Joh. Thauler [who] lived at Colen [sic] in Germany in the year of [Ou]r Lord, 1346, where he was in a [m]iraculous manner turned from his vain conversation to an extraordinary degree [of] holiness of life : [toge]ther with many of his precepts ... / [f]aithfully translated out of Latine.

publicationStmt.publisher: [P]rinted for Lodowick Lloyd, and are to be [sold at hi]s Shop at the Castle in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, stained, and tightly bound; bracketed material lacking from t.p., partially supplied from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
